definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: The first one is the construction of the Oberlin Student Center.
sentences.chinese: 其一，建构奥柏林学生活动中心。

sentences.english: Library English Trainning Center, English Trainning Center at the Callan activity Center.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆和青少年活动中心英语培训中心的名字是什么？

sentences.english: Tunghai life bustled around the student center to this day.
sentences.chinese: 目前这里仍是一个全校师生生活与活动中心。

sentences.english: It's like a reception area for a community center.
sentences.chinese: 这里看起来就像社区活动中心的接待处一样。

sentences.english: The proposal encompasses renewing the community center and the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这项提案包括了重建活动中心以及花园的部分。

sentences.english: It asks us the teahouse as the centre of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 它叫我们茶馆作为街坊四邻的活动中心。

sentences.english: But I don't see a funeral home; I see an events center.
sentences.chinese: 但我不认为这是殡仪馆，我把它当作活动中心。

sentences.english: In the cities of Italy, piazzas are the acknowledged centers of local activity.
sentences.chinese: 在意大利的城市里，广场是公认的群众活动中心。

sentences.english: City Library, youth activity centers are located here.
sentences.chinese: 市图书馆，青少年活动中心都坐落在这里。

sentences.english: They passed the hat to raise funds for the new youth centre.
sentences.chinese: 他们为新的青年活动中心募捐。

sentences.english: It’s especially powerful at the center of a social media program.
sentences.chinese: 它在社会媒体活动中心的宣传力度很强。

sentences.english: How do you feel about the location selection of the new Government Water Sports Center in Stanley Main Beach?
sentences.chinese: 你认为政府于正滩水上活动中心的选址恰当吗？

sentences.english: Pyongyang was the center of Christian activity before the Korean War.
sentences.chinese: 在朝鲜战争前，平壤是基督教徒的活动中心。

sentences.english: It asks us to see the teahouse as the center of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 《茶馆》让我们茶馆作为街坊四邻的活动中心。

sentences.english: In China, construction on an activity center in quake hit Hanwang nears completion.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，地震灾区汉旺的活动中心兴建工程几近完工。

definition: Children's Palace, institution where children can take part in various extracurricular activities
